subtitle: I received a email from the Department
of Health with a link to the CDC
advising me as a physician that they
were going to adjust the way death
certificates were completed what did a
just death certificates mean they said
in this document if you think that
you can put it down as a cause of death
there's a box too on a death certificate
where you put contributing conditions if
influenza we put it in the contributing
conditions box we were being told with
this disease we could put it as a cause
